oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Variation of total Q-prime curvature on CR manifolds
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hirachi, Kengo
Marugame, Taiji
Matsumoto, Yoshihiko
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Differential Geometry
Mathematics - Complex Variables
32V05 (primary ), 32Q15 (secondary)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We derive variational formulas for the total Q-prime curvature under the deformation of strictly pseudoconvex domains in a complex manifold. We also show that the total Q-prime curvature agrees with the renormalized volume of such domains with respect to the complete Einstein-K\"ahler metric. In the appendix, by Rod Gover and the first author, we study the property of CR invariant differential operator of order 2(n+3) on 2n+1 dimensional CR manifolds that appears in the second variational formula of the total Q-prime curvature.
